body:
Which TeamSpeak do I download?

I know it's TS3 But do I download the client or server version? (Windows)
And do I download 32 or 64 bit?
body_tagged:
Which TeamSpeak do I download?

I know it's TS3 But do I download the client or server version? (Windows)
And do I download 32 or 64 bit?
title: Teamspeak help.

replies.body: You download the client version. The other question I am not too sure about as I use Mac, sorry :/ You could try both.
replies.body_tagged: You download the client version. The other question I am not too sure about as I use Mac, sorry :/ You could try both.

replies.body: I would suggest against installing Overwolf..
replies.body_tagged: I would suggest against installing Overwolf..

replies.body:
To know whether to download 32 or 64 bit you download the one corresponding to bits of your operating system or OS.
To determine that use the instructions below. If it's x86 its 32bit and x64 is 64 bit

Click .
Click Control Panel.
Click System and Security.
Click System.
Note: Your system type displays under System.
replies.body_tagged:
To know whether to download 32 or 64 bit you download the one corresponding to bits of your operating system or OS.
To determine that use the instructions below. If it's x86 its 32bit and x64 is 64 bit

Note: Your system type displays under System.

replies.body: I would assume you have a 64bit PC. Go to www.teamspeak.com, then select TS3 for Windows (Client). Download that and install!
replies.body_tagged: I would assume you have a 64bit PC. Go to www.teamspeak.com, then select TS3 for Windows (Client). Download that and install!

replies.body: Yeah what is the advantage of overwolf? I didn't install it yet.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah what is the advantage of overwolf? I didn't install it yet.

replies.body: Overwolf is a free software Sponsored by TeamSpeak.It allows you to record , take pictures and browse the web.Personally find it very laggy and annoying but it is totally up to you.
replies.body_tagged: Overwolf is a free software Sponsored by TeamSpeak.It allows you to record , take pictures and browse the web.Personally find it very laggy and annoying but it is totally up to you.
